content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'trip' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'nyc')
CREATE TABLE nyc.trip
	(
	 [medallion] nvarchar(4000),
	 [hack_license] nvarchar(4000),
	 [vendor_id] nvarchar(4000),
	 [rate_code] bigint,
	 [store_and_fwd_flag] nvarchar(4000),
	 [pickup_datetime] datetime2(0),
	 [dropoff_datetime] datetime2(0),
	 [passenger_count] bigint,
	 [trip_time_in_secs] bigint,
	 [trip_distance] float,
	 [pickup_longitude] float,
	 [pickup_latitude] float,
	 [dropoff_longitude] float,
	 [dropoff_latitude] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_trip
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO nyc.trip
(medallion 1, hack_license 2, vendor_id 3, rate_code 4, store_and_fwd_flag 5, pickup_datetime 6, dropoff_datetime 7, passenger_count 8, trip_time_in_secs 9, trip_distance 10, pickup_longitude 11, pickup_latitude 12, dropoff_longitude 13, dropoff_latitude 14)
FROM 'https://thays3wnpwh332p4poc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/trip-data.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 13
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://thays3wnpwh332p4poc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM nyc.trip
GO
